comment_body: ... god DAMN. That took me a few moments to realize what happened, and when it did... Great work, OP. Well written story with a heartbreaking ending.
Very well written. I didn't realize quite what was going on until I read the numbers on his left arm line. Ooohh. Got it
This is really good I love it.
I don’t understand plz enlighten me
Holy shit that was chilling.  Well done!
This is fantastic. Actually. I didn’t expect that. It was so chilling to read.
Great job. Well written.
I had to read it twice to get it but when I got it I was like YOOOOOOO. That was a really fucking good story
Oh wow :(
Exceptional. You write so well on so many different subjects, but always get that twist at the end, or surprising ending.  Wonderfully done.
Thank you!
I believe they are in a concentration camp. None of them are dreams.. Brilliant story an gave me such chills.

They are having nightmares years later about how they were taken to a concentration camp, and how their family was killed. 

The faded numbers on their arm are the tattoos they gave the prisoners
Thanks!
Thanks! Tried going for something that really hits hard rather than plain horror. Glad it paid dividends for you

I noticed one of these... :( 



 So here take this... :D
Hey, that actually means a lot, thank you! I try to keep the topics new and original, and the twists, well, gotta have those! Really appreciate the kind words.
Oh shit that’s fucking dark. Brilliant story that’s sent chills down my spine
No problem! I like giving feedback on stories I like because I write on these subs too and really appreciate it.
Damn I just joined but I can tell we need more people like you. Nothing better than getting some good feedback
